Music

Film Score

SALIM & SULAIMAN MERCHANT

Brothers Salim and Sulaiman Merchant are among India's most successful composer duos. Known for their innovative Bollywood soundtracks, they combine traditional Indian music with modern Western elements.

Soundtrack Highlights

  • Main Theme - Gate to Heaven
  • Nisha's Journey
  • Airport Dreams
  • The Gate
  • Reunion

The music for "Gate to Heaven" blends Indian sounds with international influences, underscoring the multicultural atmosphere of the film set at Frankfurt Airport.
